sub_title: Data Steward at B. Braun BV
summary:
Data Steward with solid understanding of SalesForceDotCom - & CRM solutions (Siebel); working knowledge of several ERP Systems like SAP R3, Oracle Financials and other Tools lik, Agile Engineering Software, Supply Chain Execution Management (or WMS) systems. 

Extensive Sales- and Marketing Operations experiences buildup with International Companies.

Basic knowledge of SQL (Scripts & Data management). Solid knowledge of Relational Databases and their Business use. 

Application of  Business Intelligence – Tools for Reporting (Sales) or Segmentation (Marketing) purposes. Expert with SAP Business Objects-, QuickView/QuickSense- Reporting and other Query tools. 

Familiar with Quality Improvement Technologies (TQM, Six Sigma, JIT, Lean Thinking).

Analytic mind, Creative thinker, Problem Solving instead of Firefighting mentality, Result driven, 	Customer focused (Account Management experiences).

courses.name: Alien RFID Academy European training on July ’04
Audit to the new ISO 9001:2000 standard (Lloyd’s Register) on Mar ’02
Full End User Business Objects course on April ‘05
Intelligent Supply Chain Execution M.S. (V3 Systems WMS+) on Aug ‘03
Management of Change course (HP internal) on Jan ‘06
Six Sigma Greenbelt Training (Iomega internal) on Jan ‘01

profile_positions.description: The Data Steward maintains & manages data Quality throughout the entire Organization in order to align all available data, providing the Business with the relevant standardized, centralized data accurately and in Time. The Data Steward contributes to the position of B. Braun Benelux as a professional, value- adding, trustworthy partner, anticipating and responding to internal & external customer needs and achieving high customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Data Steward

profile_positions.description:
As part of the Market to Order Excellence Program team for the Benelux Market I provide cross Sector (Healthcare and Personal Health) support for the SalesForceCom CRM- Solution (and underlying SAP ERP Systems) to the Sales- & Marketing teams at Philips Benelux. 

Responsibilities:
- Data Cleaning & Data Migration Coordination Activities
- Define and monitor Service Level Agreements (SLA) between Benelux Market and the 
  central Enterprise Information Management (EIM) Team
- Monitor Data Services and provide input in regards to processes and procedures with 
  focus on improvements
- Analysis of Data (sourced from the different ERP and CRM systems in use)
- Issue Management (Identify and resolve any Data related issues and escalate to Head of 
  M2O Excellence Benelux when appropriate)
- Participate in all Project related meetings (Local- and Central teams, Internal- & External parties)
- Support internal CRM Training's program across Sectors and act as a backup for local End-user Supportteam
profile_positions.title: Market Data Steward

company.name: Market Data Steward (Interim via YER) at Philips

profile_positions.description: Support the the SalesForceCom CRM- Solution implementation at Philips Benelux.
profile_positions.title: Market Data Steward (Interim via YER) at Philips

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
-	Country Deployment Manager for all Projects related to CRM.
-	Operational Management of local CRM (& Near/Offshore- Support) Team(s) against SLA.
-	Country Project lead for migration to Salesforce CRM Solution in 2012 in the Netherlands.
-       Country Project lead for Siebel / Oracle CRM on Demand \ SFDC ongoing W.W. releases.
-	Governance of Scripts, Workflows and Interfaces related to CRM.
-	Data mining & enrichment for Marketing and Sales, supporting local Telemarketing.
-	Lead for DM- and eDM- Campaigns (Privacy, Profiling, Segmentation and Event support).
-       Provide Business Intelligence reporting to both Sales- and Marketing Departments
-       Maintain B2B DB of 100k Companies & 250k Contacts
-       Provide support to CRM user base of 500+ (Sales Force Automation)

Projects:
-       Project manager implementation Siebel CRM (v 7.5) at HP Israel
-       Project manager EMEA switch from overnight Scripts into Siebel-based Workflows solutions.
-       Project HP Netherlands Install base Knowledge DB solution with Partner Computer Profile.
-	Implement Closed Loop Lead Marketing Solution locally (resulting in a 300% increase in lead
        generation, acceptance and win ratio).
-	Implement privacy- and touch governance locally for B2B e-communications to meet Dutch 
        legal requirements.
profile_positions.title: CRM Manager

profile_positions.description:
Data-Analyses (i.e. Translate the need within Sales, Marketing and Global Operations man-agement into data-analyses) through Business Objects Software on CRM DB.

Design and Improve Funnel- and Performance Reporting through Business Objects Software on CRM DB (Siebel eBusiness).
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst CRM

Spider-in-web role for Xterprise with TPG/TNT.

Test en implement Pilot project for Reverse Logistics Service Part Management System at Excel.
Prepare and execute End- /Super User Training (and Customer acceptances testing) of a V3 Software Solution (Exel – NEC in NL & Sweden).
Spider-in-web position for V3 within European Market.
Worked closely with Sales Management at Top 5 Third Party Logistics Providers (3PL’s) in Europe.

profile_positions.description:

-	Account- & Operational (PLM) Management for Iomega Repair Program.
-	Implementation ERP/WMS (Glovia / Chess) Software Solution.
-	Management of Supplier Owned Inventories.
-	Implement & Monitor Key Performance Indicators & Service Levels.

profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Management (for the development of a Manufacturing Execution Software Solution) for Iomega’s World Wide Serial Number Tracking Project for the European Distribution Centre. 

Implementing In line Automated Quality Inspection & Rejection steps based on Weight (SKU/BOM management) for new Production line. 

Implementing Serial number Verification against Data Ware House DB during Production (both Hardware and Software aspects) on both Manual and Automated Production lines. 

Assist with the relocation of the European Distribution Center (Operations) from Utrecht to Tiel (Danzas operated).

Support the Iomega Engineering Department in finding, designing and implementing Production Improvements in regards to layout, processes and procedures.

Implement re-usable Single Drive Packaging for AEX/RMA process (6 Sigma project). 

Assist with outsourcing all European Reverse Logistic Processes in Europe (RMA).
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer & Project Manager, Operations

profile_positions.description:
Sales-and-Operations Planning (introductions of new products / change management) involving Marketing, Sales, Operations and Financial functions. 

Production - & Configuration support (Stop Ship / Recall / Testing / Reworks) for Retail & OEM.

Responsibility for all Quality related processes regarding OEM products (Apple, Dell, Gateway, HP, Packard Bell).

Supervise European Third-Party Hubs (Ireland & Scotland) for OEM Customers (Apple, Dell, Gateway, HP, IBM, Compaq and Tier 2 Accounts).
profile_positions.title: OEM Quality Engineer, Operations
